title: Global Day of Coderetreat 2015 - Bucharest, Romania
description:
As we did last year, we’ll join programmers from all over the world. We’ll meet, code and have fun for sure during the day! 
The event will be organized by AgileWorks community and hosted by MozaicLabs (http://mozaiclabs.com/). Alexandru Bolboca (https://www.linkedin.com/in/alexandrubolboaca) will facilitate.  
If you want to join us, please register on the event meetup page: http://www.meetup.com/The-Bucharest-Agile-Software-Meetup-Group/events/225840111/.
